testcase.description: Lan interface link aggregation, mode trunk, direction interface2agg/agg2interface/both, Pkts mode no_tag/vlan_tag(correct/incorrect)/bad_pkts
testcase.comment: Test procedure 1. IXIA port1 send random source mac broadcast pkts, result 1 2. IXIA port1 send random source mac multicast pkts, result 1 3. IXIA port1 send random destination mac unicast pkts, result 1 4. IXIA port1 send random source mac IXIA port_channel mac is destination unicast pkts, result 1 5. IXIA port 3 or 4 send broadcast/multicast/unicast pkts with tagged vlan 10, result 2 6. IXIA port 3 or 4 send broadcast/multicast/unicast pkts with tagged vlan 20, result 3 7. Modify the port-channelâ€™s members media from copper to fiber 8. Repeat1-6, result 4 9. IXIA port1 send random source IP unicast pkts, result 1 10. IXIA port1 send random destination IP unicast pkts, result 1 11. IXIA port1 send random ports unicast pkts, result 1 Expect result Result 1: IXIA port 3 and port4 get the pkts from port1 is about 1:1 Result 2: IXIA port 1 get the pkts from port 3 or 4 successfully Result 3: IXIA port 1 cannot get any pkts, because the pkts dropped on port 3 or 4 Result 4: The same as before

step.desc: Show interface mgt0 to get ip address
Get mgt0's ip address
aggregation, mode trunk, direction ingress.
step.ssh: -v 'vlan ${correct_vlan}' -v 'vlan ${incorrect_vlan}' -v 'agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} switch mode trunk' -v 'interface ${sw1.port2} switch mode trunk' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface ${sw1.port2} agg ${agg_id}' -v 'interface agg${agg_id} switchport mode trunk' -v 'no interface agg${agg_id} switchport trunk allow vlan all' -v 'no interface agg${agg_id} switchport trunk native vlan' -v 'interface agg${agg_id} switchport trunk allow vlan ${correct_vlan}' -v 'interface ${sw1.port4} switchport mode trunk' -v 'no interface ${sw1.port4} switchport trunk allow vlan all' -v 'no interface ${sw1.port4} switchport trunk native vlan' -v 'interface ${sw1.port4} switchport trunk allow vlan ${correct_vlan}' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: Direction:ingress; Pkts:no_tag; Port1 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:no_tag, Port1 send pkts; rx1=0(pkt droped on port 1, no-tag+native vlan is not in allow vlan list)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:no_tag; Port2 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:no_tag, Port2 send pkts; rx1=0(pkt droped on port 2, no-tag+native vlan is not in allow vlan list)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:no_tag; Both Port1 and 2 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:no_tag; Expect:rx1=0(pkt droped on port 1 and 2, no-tag+native vlan is not in allow vlan list)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:correct_vlan; Port1 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:correct_vlan, Port1 send pkts; rx1=tx1(trunk port allow pkt with vlan tag in allow list)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:correct_vlan; Port2 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:correct_vlan, Port2 send pkts; rx1=tx2(trunk port allow pkt with vlan tag in allow list)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:correct_vlan; Both Port1 and 2 send pkts
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${tx_port1},${rx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0015 -mac_src 0000.0000.0016 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${correct_vlan}" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0015 -mac_src 0000.0000.0017 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${correct_vlan} -rate_pps 20" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxPortList ${rx_port1}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -txStParaList framesSent,framesSent -rxPortList ${rx_port1} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:ingress; Pkts:correct_tag; Expect:rx1=tx1+tx2(ppkts with vlan tag in allow vlan list should be captured on rx1)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan; Port1 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan, Port1 send pkts; rx1=0 (trunk port drop any pkt with vlan tag)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan; Port2 send pkts
Direction:ingress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan, Port2 send pkts; rx1=0(trunk port drop any pkt with vlan tag)
Direction:ingress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan; Both Port1 and 2 send pkts
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${tx_port1},${rx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0015 -mac_src 0000.0000.0016 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${incorrect_vlan}" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0015 -mac_src 0000.0000.0017 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${incorrect_vlan} -rate_pps 20" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxPortList ${rx_port1}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -txStParaList framesSent,framesSent -rxPortList ${rx_port1} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:ingress; Pkts:incorrect_tag; Expect:rx1=0(pkts with vlan tag not in allow vlan list should be dropped)
source aggregation_trunk, direction egress. configure port4's vlan is the same as agg 1
Direction:egress; Pkts:no_tag, rx1 to tx1 and tx2
Direction:egress; Pkts:no_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get tx1 receive pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:no_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get tx2 receive pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:no_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get rx1 send pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:no_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; check if tx1+tx2=0(pkt droped on port 1 and 2 , no tag+ native vlan is not in allow vlan list)
step.log-match: -e "The two lists' sum are the same"

step.desc: Direction:egress; Pkts:correct vlan tag
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0011 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${correct_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port2} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0012 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${correct_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${rx_port1} -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${rx_port1} -txStParaList framesSent -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2,userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:egress; Pkts:correct_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get tx1 send pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:correct_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get tx2 send pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:correct_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get rx1 receive pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:correct_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; check if tx1+tx2=rx1(pkt with vlan_tag in all vlan list should be captured)
step.log-match: -e "The two lists' sum are the same"

step.desc: Direction:egress; Pkts:incorrect vlan tag
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0011 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${incorrect_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port2} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0012 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${incorrect_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${rx_port1} -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${rx_port1} -txStParaList framesSent -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2,userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:egress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get tx1 receive pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get tx2 receive pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; Get rx1 send pkts
Direction:egress; Pkts:incorrect_vlan_tag; rx1 to tx1 and tx2; check if tx1+tx2=0(pkt droped on port 1 and 2 , vlan tag is not in allow vlan list)
step.log-match: -e "The two lists' sum are the same"

step.desc: aggregation, mode trunk, direction both.
Direction:both; Pkts:no_tag; tx1 and tx2 to rx1/ rx1 to tx1 and tx2
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0011 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port2} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0012 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -txStParaList framesSent,framesSent -rxPortList ${rx_port1} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${rx_port1} -txStParaList framesSent -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2,userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:both; Pkts:no_tag; Expect:rx1=0/ tx1+tx2= 0(no tag pkts is not in allow vlan list)
Direction:both; Pkts:correct vlan; tx1 and tx2 to rx1/ rx1 to tx1 and tx2
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0011 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${correct_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port2} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0012 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${correct_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -txStParaList framesSent,framesSent -rxPortList ${rx_port1} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${rx_port1} -txStParaList framesSent -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2,userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:both; Pkts:correct_tag; Expect:rx1=tx1+tx2/ tx1+tx2= rx1(all pkts with vlan tag in allow vlan list should be captured)
Direction:both; Pkts:incorrect vlan; tx1 and tx2 to rx1/ rx1 to tx1 and tx2
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port2.ixia_port.phytype},${sw1.port4.ixia_port.phytype} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip}" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port1} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0011 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${incorrect_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${rx_port1},${tx_port2} -mac_dst 0000.0000.0012 -mac_src 0000.0000.0001 -mac_src_count 8 -mac_src_step 1 -vlan enable -vlan_id ${incorrect_vlan} -rate_pps 100" -v "" -v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1} -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2},${rx_port1}" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -txStParaList framesSent,framesSent -rxPortList ${rx_port1} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "check_sum_equal_tx_with_rx -txPortList ${rx_port1} -txStParaList framesSent -rxPortList ${tx_port1},${tx_port2} -rxStParaList userDefinedStat2,userDefinedStat2" -v "" -v "exit"

step.desc: Direction:both; Pkts:correct_tag; Expect:rx1=0/ tx1+tx2= 0(trunk port will droped all pkts with vlan tag not in allow vlan list)
